EmailTemplate.description: Template used for sending TMLA pdf-template to SBU for sharing with customer for signature
EmailTemplate.name: TMLA - Sending of Agreement to SBU for sharing with Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Trademark License Agreement: DuPont - {!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Qualification__c.Owner__c}, Re:
DuPont Trademark involved:
{!Qualification__c.Qualification_Program__c}
Name & Address of LICENSEE:
{!Account.Name} {!Account.BillingAddress}
We hereby send you the pdf-version of the {!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c} TMLA for sharing with the customer.
If they agree with the attached contract, please ask them to print out 2 copies, complete the Exhibit named "INSURANCE" and sign the copies. The completed and signed original contracts can then be sent by post to our Geneva office, as per the below address details:
DuPont de Nemours International S.A Attn: {!Qualification__c.LastModifiedBy} 2, ch. du Pavillon CH-1218 Le Grand-Saconnex / Geneva SWITZERLAND e-mail: emea.marketing@che.dupont.com
Should you or the customer have any further questions regarding to the TMLA, please do not hesitate to contact us for further clarifications.
Best regards
{!Qualification__c.LastModifiedBy} Brand Management, DuPont EMEA Copyright (c) 2013 DuPont. All rights reserved. The DuPont Oval Logo, DuPont(TM), The miracles of science(TM) and all products denoted with (R) or (TM) are registered trademarks or trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliates. www.dupont.com | Legal Notices & Terms of Use | PRIVACY
